titleStmt.title: Job's assurance of the resurrection a sermon at Winwick in the county palatine of Lancaster, June 25, 1689 at the funeral of the Reverend Richard Sherlock D.D., late rector there / by Tho. Crane.
titleStmt.author: Crane, Tho. (Thomas), b. 1645?

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon preach'd at the funeral of the Reverend Richard Sherlock D.D.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
